inclusion.criterion: positive for HCV RNA on testing with the polymerase chain reaction (quantitative test)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: qualitative test positive if quantitative negative, have undergone a liver biopsy within one year before entry
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: available for analysis (vide infra) and whose results are consistent with a diagnosis of chronic hepatitis with at least moderate inflammation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: a fibrosis score of at least 2/6 according to Ishak et al (1995)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: abstainers (less than 12 drinks in the past year)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: those who drink lightly (1-13 drinks per month) or moderately (4-14 drinks per week)
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection, on IFN and RBV combination therapy for 9 months with direct antiviral drugs added 6 months ago. Recent biopsy was negative for hepatocellular carcinoma.
